title.native: 30歳まで童貞だと魔法使いになれるらしい
title.romaji: 30-sai made Doutei da to Mahou Tsukai ni Nareru Rashii
title.english: Cherry Magic! Thirty Years of Virginity Can Make You a Wizard?!

description:
Adachi's 30th birthday as a virgin came with the oddest gift—the ability to read the mind of anyone he touches. Pondering what to do with this mysterious power, he gets a lead when he accidentally reads his colleague Kurosawa's mind. Turns out the handsome hotshot of the sales team has got a thing for him! How will Adachi respond to overhearing these affectionate thoughts?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Cherry Magic! 30 ยังซิงกับเวทมนตร์ปิ๊งรัก
如果30歲還是處男，似乎就能成為魔法師
Оказывается, можно стать волшебником, если хранить девственность до 30 лет

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%B8%E7%94%B0%E9%9A%86%E5%AE%8F)

Takahiro Kishida is an animator and renown character designer.

Kishida's designs are well received by animators and attract talent into shows easily. He is also praised for his shot composition skills and copies of his layouts are widely distributed in the industry as drawing reference. Nowadays he is mostly only credited for character design in the shows he participates in, but in reality he works as an animation director uncredited quite often. He rarely heavily corrects the key animator's cuts, strongly believing that the animators' distinctiveness should be noticeable.

Noted for his designs on shows like [Haikyuu](https://anilist.co/anime/20464/), [Serial Experiments Lain](https://anilist.co/anime/339/), [Madoka Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/), [Baccano](https://anilist.co/anime/2251/) and more.

__Height:__ 157 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/386miyamura) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDuFHS9IIiiOzEAgC-HIUdg)  | [2nd YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvlLWnOfx-B61qC59MRLHDg/) | [VTuber Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb1IfpmmoKaVkp9ES_gBQjg) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/yuko-miyamura/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Y%C5%ABko_Miyamura)

Yūko Miyamura is a Japanese actress, voice actress, singer and sound director.

She voices Miu Boude from the duo 'Miu and Sakura' as a regional mascot for the city of Hannan, Osaka.

__Non-anime roles:__ 
• Chun-Li from Street Fighter (Video game series)
• Larxene from Kingdom Hearts (Video game series)
• Training video announcer from Battle Royale (live-action movie)

[Profile (VIMS)](https://www.vims.co.jp/talent_profile_detail.php?id=60) I [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryt_suzuki)

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Asclepius](https://anilist.co/character/189144/Asclepius) - Fate/Grand Order (video games)
- Male Aran - MapleStory
- Sugawa Ginnosuke - Hanaemu Kare to & bloom
- Trey Clover - Disney: Twisted-Wonderland

[Website](https://www.koeninaranaiyo.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@offical7532) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koeninaranaiyo)

Musical duo consisting of HiRo (Keyboard) and Wakamiya Meme (Vocals)

[Website](https://www.koeninaranaiyo.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@offical7532) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koeninaranaiyo)

Musical duo consisting of HiRo (Keyboard) and Wakamiya Meme (Vocals)

[Website](https://www.koeninaranaiyo.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@offical7532) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koeninaranaiyo)

Musical duo consisting of HiRo (Keyboard) and Wakamiya Meme (Vocals)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HEYSUEZO) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jallenlord/)

Affiliated with [Crunchyroll](https://anilist.co/studio/6421) as an ADR Director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/772463158506106881)

Akane worked at [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/) for the first 15 years of his career. There he collaborated with [Shouji Kawamori](https://anilist.co/staff/97501/) to direct his most famous work, [Vision of Escaflowne](https://anilist.co/anime/182/). After having left Sunrise in 2000, he joined [Satelight](https://anilist.co/studio/41/), where he created and directed the shows [Geneshaft](https://anilist.co/anime/909/), [HeatGuy J](https://anilist.co/anime/958/), and the most famous of the three, [Noein: To Your Other Self](https://anilist.co/anime/584/).

Since then Akane has gone freelance. His more recent works include [Birdy the Mighty: Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/) and [Stars Align](https://anilist.co/anime/104052/).
